name: Stupid Sacrifice
description:
Cultists and Aztecs are not the only ones sacrificing their (and other's) lifes. Heroes and renegades in movies and show do it all the time.

From time to time though. That whole sacrifice thing? Not required.

Controls: Mouse and Keyboard

NO SOUND

Attributions
